mapper.select: SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN s.subject_finish_result = '승리' THEN bo.order_amount * (s.subject_total_yes_point / s.subject_total_no_point) ELSE -bo.order_amount END) / SUM(bo.order_amount)) * 100 AS profit_loss_rate FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo ON u.user_no = bo.order_user_no JOIN TBL_SUBJECT s ON bo.order_subject_no = s.subject_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo} GROUP BY u.user_no, u.user_name, u.user_email;
SELECT user_authority FROM tbl_subject JOIN tbl_user ON subject_register_user_no=user_no AND subject_register_user_no=#{subjectUserNo}
